name: Pizza Rat Quest
description:
play AS pizza rat in this quest to get pizza, rescue your friends, and return home

Use the arrow keys to move and the x key to look at your inventory.

Get all the pizzas, give pizzas to all the locked-up rats. Lots of different endings, post the one you got in the comments. 

My first game made with Pico-8! It's a charming little editor, it makes you do a lot of the engine legwork yourself though. Honestly maybe not recommended for beginners, but there are lots of beginner-friendly tutorials out there, like the one I used. 

Stuff

  • Art/Code/Sound made with Pico-8
  • Created by following this tutorial: https://mboffin.itch.io/pico-8-top-down-adventure-game-tutorial
  • Made in ~4 hours
  • Cart can be found in my public Low Effort Jam repo: https://github.com/heyacfox/LEGJ-Submissions/tree/main/PizzaRatQuest
